content:
Hi Everyone, I am Deepak a software engineer from India for the past year I have been learning nix and including it in most of my workflows and I attempted to use nix as a code execution engine that supports most languages, language dependencies for some of them and system packages. I am currently running user submitted code inside containers and sharing the nix store between containers using podman overlay mounts. You can check out the project here - Odin

Please let me know your thoughts and any feedback that you have.
